title: Luca Cordero di Montezemolo
snippet: Luca Cordero di Montezemolo (Italian pronunciation: [ˈluːka korˈdɛːro di ˌmontedˈdzɛːmolo, -dˈdzeːm-]; born 31 August 1947) is an Italian businessman and motorsport executive who is best known as the former chairman of Ferrari, Fiat S.p.A., Confindustria and Alitalia.

title: Luca Cordero di Montezemolo odchodzi z Ferrari. Dyrektor Generalny Fiata, Sergio Marchionne nowym Prezesem. | FCA archives | Stellantis Media
snippet: "W 2003 roku - powiedział Dyrektor Generalny Fiata, Sergio Marchionne - Luca i ja w tym samym dniu otrzymaliśmy nominację na stanowisko Członków Zarządu Fiata. Rok później ja zostałem Dyrektorem Generalnym, a on Prezesem.

title: Fiat S.p.A. - Wikipedia
snippet: After Umberto Agnelli's death on 28 May 2004, Luca Cordero di Montezemolo was named chairman, with Agnelli heir John Elkann becoming vice chairman (at the age of 28), and other family members also serving on the board.

title: Luca Cordero di Montezemolo - Unionpedia, the concept map
snippet: Luca Cordero di Montezemolo (born 31 August 1947) is an Italian businessman who is best known as former Chairman of Ferrari, and formerly Chairman of Fiat S.p.A. and President of Confindustria and FIEG. 69 relations.

title: Fremantle Secures Global Rights to Documentary ‘Luca: Seeing Red’ About Ferrari’s Luca di Montezemolo: ‘I’ve Lived My Life at Full Speed’ (EXCLUSIVE)
snippet: Fremantle has acquired worldwide distribution rights to feature documentary “Luca: Seeing Red” about the life of businessman and former chairperson of Ferrari Luca Cordero di Montezemolo. The doc – about to be launched at Mipcom in Cannes – sees Chris Harris (“Top Gear”) traveling to Italy to “meet his hero” while “blending rare archive and …
